prompt: Professional corporate photography. Confident Arab executive in traditional white kandura with bisht standing in modern glass high-rise office overlooking Dubai skyline at golden hour. Subtle holographic AI data visualizations and neural network patterns floating in the background. Deep blue and gold color palette. Shot on Sony A7III with 50mm f/1.4 lens. Cinematic lighting with warm window light mixed with cool tech glow. Sharp focus on subject, shallow depth of field on city background. Premium luxury aesthetic, authoritative leadership mood. 8K ultra-detailed corporate executive portrait.
